languages.text: {n}Вам знакомо это ощущение — варп-колдовство когда-то оставило на вас {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}неизгладимую тень{/d}. Вы закрываете глаза, освобождаете свое сознание от мыслей — и демоны вашей души с воем взвиваются, противостоя атаке чужой воли.{/n}

{n}The sensation is familiar, for this is not the first time the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}shadow of warp sorcery{/d} has fallen heavily upon you. You close your eyes and cast aside all thought — and your inner horrors cry out and rise against the will of another.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам знакомо это ощущение — варп-колдовство когда-то оставило на вас {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}неизгладимую тень{/d}. Вы закрываете глаза, освобождаете свое сознание от мыслей — и демоны вашей души с воем взвиваются, противостоя атаке чужой воли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sensation is familiar, for this is not the first time the shadow of warp sorcery has fallen heavily upon you. You close your eyes and cast away all thought — and your inner horrors cry out and rise against the will of another.{/n}

{n}The sensation is familiar, for this is not the first time the shadow of warp sorcery has fallen heavily upon you. You close your eyes and cast away all thought — and your inner horrors cry out and rise against the will of another.{/n}

{n}The sensation is familiar, for this is not the first time the shadow of warp sorcery has fallen heavily upon you. You close your eyes and cast aside all thought — and your inner horrors cry out and rise against the will of another.{/n}

{n}The sensation is familiar, for this is not the first time the shadow of warp sorcery has fallen heavily upon you. You close your eyes and cast aside all thought — and your inner horrors cry out and rise against the will of another.{/n}

{n}The sensation is familiar, for this is not the first time the shadow of warp sorcery has fallen heavily upon you. You close your eyes and cast aside all thought — and your inner horrors cry out and rise against the will of another.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这种感觉很熟悉，因为这已经不是第一次{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}亚空间巫术的阴影{/d}沉重地落在你身上了。你闭上眼睛，将所有的想法弃置一旁。你内心的恐怖之物在高声呐喊，与另一个人的意志发生了碰撞。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sensation is familiar, for this is not the first time the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}shadow of warp sorcery{/d} has fallen heavily upon you. You close your eyes and cast aside all thought — and your inner horrors cry out and rise against the will of another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这种感觉很熟悉，因为这已经不是第一次亚空间的巫术沉重地落在你身上了。你闭上眼睛，将所有的想法弃置一旁。你内心的恐怖之物在高声呐喊，与另一个人的意志发生了碰撞。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Gefühl ist vertraut, denn der {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Schatten der Warphexerei{/d} ist nicht zum ersten Mal schwer auf dich gefallen. Du schließt die Augen und stößt jeden Gedanken fort. Sofort schreien deine inneren Schrecken auf und erheben sich gegen den Willen eines anderen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sensation is familiar, for this is not the first time the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}shadow of warp sorcery{/d} has fallen heavily upon you. You close your eyes and cast aside all thought — and your inner horrors cry out and rise against the will of another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gefühl ist vertraut, denn der Schatten der Warphexerei ist nicht zum ersten Mal schwer auf dich gefallen. Du schließt die Augen und stößt jeden Gedanken fort. Sofort schreien deine inneren Schrecken auf und erheben sich gegen den Willen eines anderen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cette sensation vous est familière. Ce n'est pas la première fois que la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sombre sorcellerie du Warp{/d} tente de vous submerger. Vous fermez les yeux et videz votre esprit de toute pensée pour laisser vos horreurs intérieures s'opposer à la volonté d'un autre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sensation is familiar, for this is not the first time the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}shadow of warp sorcery{/d} has fallen heavily upon you. You close your eyes and cast aside all thought — and your inner horrors cry out and rise against the will of another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cette sensation vous est familière. Ce n'est pas la première fois que la sombre sorcellerie du Warp tente de vous submerger. Vous fermez les yeux et videz votre esprit de toute pensée pour laisser vos horreurs intérieures s'opposer à la volonté d'un autre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Reconoces la sensación, ya que no es la primera vez que usan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}brujería de disformidad{/d} contra ti. Cierras los ojos, vacías tu mente... y los horrores de tu interior claman y se lanzan contra la voluntad ajena.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sensation is familiar, for this is not the first time the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}shadow of warp sorcery{/d} has fallen heavily upon you. You close your eyes and cast aside all thought — and your inner horrors cry out and rise against the will of another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Reconoces la sensación, ya que no es la primera vez que usan brujería de disformidad contra ti. Cierras los ojos, vacías tu mente... y los horrores de tu interior claman y se lanzan contra la voluntad ajena.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この感覚には覚えがある。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}歪み魔術の影{/d}があなたに重くのしかかるのは、これが初めてではない。あなたは目を閉じ、すべての思考を捨て…そして、内なる恐怖が泣き叫び、それ以外の意志に反抗して立ち上がった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sensation is familiar, for this is not the first time the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}shadow of warp sorcery{/d} has fallen heavily upon you. You close your eyes and cast aside all thought — and your inner horrors cry out and rise against the will of another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この感覚には覚えがある。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}歪み魔術の影{/d}があなたに重くのしかかるのは、これが初めてではない。あなたは目を閉じ、すべての思考を捨て…そして、内なる恐怖が泣き叫び、それ以外の意志に反抗して立ち上がった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu his sana tanıdık geliyor. İlk defa {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}öteboyut sahirliğinin ağır etkisinde{/d} kalmıyorsun. Gözlerini kapatıp tüm düşüncelerini bir kenara bırakıyorsun. Zihnindeki tüm korkular, bu yabancı iradeye kafa tutmak için feryat ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sensation is familiar, for this is not the first time the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}shadow of warp sorcery{/d} has fallen heavily upon you. You close your eyes and cast aside all thought — and your inner horrors cry out and rise against the will of another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu his sana tanıdık geliyor. Öteboyut sahirliğinin ağır etkisinde ilk kalışın değil bu. Gözlerini kapatıp tüm düşüncelerini bir kenara bırakıyorsun. Zihnindeki tüm korkular, bu yabancı iradeye kafa tutmak için feryat ediyor.{/n}
